title: Automatic Update Android 10 Breaks Pixel 3XL
content:
My phone no longer connects to my data plan
I cannot screenshot as I used to be able to by holding down the power button and selecting screenshot - doesn't seem to be an updated way to screenshot
App interactivity issues
Apps do not seem to be interacting with each other
I cannot see notifications if I am in an app
My contacts list is not syncing with my other apps
I cannot easily switch between apps like I used to
I have to restart my phone sometimes to close applications because the left arrow button does not work anymore
I cannot swipe down on my phone to open up the notification bar

These are just some of the problems I have noticed.

I now have to insert my sim card into my old iPhone and carry 2 phones around.  This is ridiculous.  And your help center needs to improve - there appears to be a lot of open forums regarding Android 10 problems, and no one to help.  Consider having a support desk like the Apple Genius Bar.

Also seriously consider regressing all updates to Android 9 while you debug Android 10.  How can people work and stay in touch like this?  Disappointed.

Upset Customer.
